P

paintComponent(Graphics) - Method in class devoworm.portegys_image_transform.PortegysImageTransform
The paintComponent() copies the BufferedImage to the screen.
PortegysImageTransform - Class in devoworm.portegys_image_transform
Portegys Image Transform: The mean of the X coordinates of a selected set of image pixels is used to create a linear vertical target line.
PortegysImageTransform() - Constructor for class devoworm.portegys_image_transform.PortegysImageTransform
The constructor sets the preferred size of the panel, creates the BufferedImage, and installs a mouse listener on the panel to implement drawing actions.
PortegysImageTransform.MouseHandler - Class in devoworm.portegys_image_transform
Defines the mouse listener object that responds to user mouse actions on the panel.
putPoint(Graphics2D, int, int, boolean) - Method in class devoworm.portegys_image_transform.PortegysImageTransform
Draw a point at (x, y).
